prompts: Create a flying-type Pokemon with vibrant blue feathers and a striking red belly.
Generate a prehistoric bird Pokemon that showcases a mix of colors and impressive wings.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a fierce avian creature, combining both elegance and power.
Show me a powerful flying Pokemon with a unique color palette, perfect for aerial battles.
Imagine a Pokemon that has an agile body and extraordinary wings, designed for speed and agility.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of ancient creatures, featuring bright colors and dynamic poses.
Give me a Pokemon with striking features and a combination of blue and red colors that stands out.
